amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part C of House Report 116-51 to increase the Emergency Watershed Program by $310 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Axne amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mrs. Axne.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Axne amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
